Title: Everything Is Now
Writer: Baran bo Odar (created by), Jantje Friese (created by), Jantje Friese, Marc O. Seng
Actors: Louis Hofmann, Lisa Vicari, Paul Lux, Moritz Jahn
Plot: Ulrich runs afoul of the law, Helge tries to dodge Egon Tiedemann, Claudia harnesses the cave's powers, and Katharina lashes out at Hannah.
